summary: Adds a follower based on Katia Managan from Prequel.
descriptionHtml:
Description
===========
This mod adds a follower based on the character Katia Managan from Prequel.

Location
========
She is located outside Solitude, at the top of the steps leading down to the docks.


Manual Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
4. Start Skyrim Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp file(s).

Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.





Contact
=======
SFLegend1@gmail.com

Thanks:
=======
Kazerad of http://www.prequeladventure.com/
Based Todd

Licensing/Legal
===============
You can do whatever you want with this mod but all I ask in return is that
you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod.
author: SF Legend

files.name: Katia in Skyrim 1-1
files.changelogHtml:
Added atronarch ability
Replaced fear spell with a new Eye of Fear greater power
Moved Broken Amulet of Silence to inventory from outfit
Added lockpick to Katia\'s inventory
Included missing facegen data
